doc.title: Lovesick
doc.plot: Pin-Up and Love Therapist Lady Desir√©e Co-Stars with Corey Feldman, accepting real people with very real romantic and sexual issues as guests into "their office" - a cozy and humorous oversized bed where the hilarious and charming Feldman and serious sexy Lady help them overcome diverse romantic and sexual issues by sending them to often unbelievable but true extreme places and sources to help them solve it. This pilot, called The First Reality TV Love Show (2001), is both a darkly comedic and deeply moving look at the many struggles of the heart.
